summary: I'm so sorry to my mutuals who don't watch any Critical Role and don't know what the fuck I'm posting and reblogging half the...
body:
I’m so sorry to my mutuals who don’t watch any Critical Role and don’t know what the fuck I’m posting and reblogging half the time on Thursday night

This Friday was a special episode where they roleplayed as Bears for the second time and fought ninjas and made 20 minutes of straight dick jokes it was great

So Beau went down on Keg and her hands count as magical now.

Does that mean that if she goes down on Yasha at end of level 12 she’ll get the Tongue of Sun and Moon?

I’m jussayin…

summary: Where should The M9 go now?
body:
Where should The M9 go now?

I believe they have three possibilities:

1) They could go the capital and investigate Trent Icathone (I think that’s how it’s spelled) to show the horrors he commits, all the while trying to not ever confront him because if they do, oh boy is that gonna be a slaughter.

2) Go to the Minagery Coast and find The Hawker. Most likely he has fled to the south of the continent, and the closest continent is… you guessed it Tal'Dorei. So maybe our friends will go to the city of Stilben, since it’s the criminal city of the continent, and that is where The Hawker most likely fled to. If not, the closest is Whitestone… now that would be interesting.

3) Confront the war and see what the fuck the Yorhasien Drow (again, I think that’s how it’s spelled) actually want. This seems to be what Matt is moving the story towards, with the Drow most likely following the Mighty Nien to get back that weird thing they stole. The rag-tag team of assholes will be thrust in to a full blown war over the continent of Wildmount and they are the only ones capable of stoping it; and maybe, just maybe, they will become the next great heroes of Exandria.

2) Go to the Minagery Coast and find The Hawker. Most likely he has fled to the south of the continent, and the closest continent is… you guessed it Tal'Dorei. So maybe our friends will go to the city of Stilben, since it’s the criminal city of the continent, and that is where The Hawker most likely fled to. If not, the closest is Whitestone… now that would be interesting.

3) Confront the war and see what the fuck the Yorhasien Drow (again, I think that’s how it’s spelled) actually want. This seems to be what Matt is moving the story towards, with the Drow most likely following the Mighty Nien to get back that weird thing they stole. summary: Class Swap
title: Class Swap
body:
They were a terror in battle, Grog Strongjaw striding into the fray head and shoulders taller than anyone else and singing terrible songs of war.  On his shoulders, working into a frenzied rage on the goliath’s battle cry, Scanlan Shorthalt never knew fear and never left a kneecap behind.  There are still tales of the path of death they have carved through many a battlefield.  Tales of their prowess and charm in the brothels of Exandria.  Tales of Scanlan the barbarian, champion of the Crucible and Grog, the Meatman, the bard, he of the purple fist, and the electric crotch.

AU August Day 8: Kwami Swap (AKA about when I realized this prompt list was for Miraculous Ladybug, I did a class swap which is practically the same thing)

summary: My one hope right now for a bit of future Caleb character development is, however many episodes down the line, when the rest of...
body: My one hope right now for a bit of future Caleb character development is, however many episodes down the line, when the rest of the Nein learn Caleb’s backstory, Fjord turns that “You can’t blame yourself when you’re taken advantage of” line back around on Caleb and the party helps him realize he was a manipulated teenager when he killed his family.

reblog.comment: My one hope right now for a bit of future Caleb character development is, however many episodes down the line, when the rest of the Nein learn Caleb’s backstory, Fjord turns that “You can’t blame yourself when you’re taken advantage of” line back around on Caleb and the party helps him realize he was a manipulated teenager when he killed his family.
